title: Can Community Infrastructure Carry Transformation Weight?
prompt: A worn wooden table in a small-town community center or church basement, scattered with handwritten volunteer schedules, donation receipts, and coffee cups, captured in soft afternoon light from a nearby window, with hands of an unidentified person reviewing papersâ€”conveying the quiet weight of grassroots organizations stretched between genuine community trust and administrative overwhelm, shot in documentary photojournalism style with muted, earthy color grading.
